semantic.description: Allowed values are LOCAL (FLOAT_MAT4 or FLOAT_MAT3), MODEL (FLOAT_MAT4 or FLOAT_MAT3), VIEW (FLOAT_MAT4 or FLOAT_MAT3), PROJECTION (FLOAT_MAT4 or FLOAT_MAT3), MODELVIEW (FLOAT_MAT4 or FLOAT_MAT3), MODELVIEWPROJECTION (FLOAT_MAT4 or FLOAT_MAT3), MODELINVERSE (FLOAT_MAT4 or FLOAT_MAT3), VIEWINVERSE (FLOAT_MAT4 or FLOAT_MAT3), PROJECTIONINVERSE (FLOAT_MAT4 or FLOAT_MAT3), MODELVIEWINVERSE (FLOAT_MAT4 or FLOAT_MAT3), MODELVIEWPROJECTIONINVERSE (FLOAT_MAT4 or FLOAT_MAT3), MODELINVERSETRANSPOSE (FLOAT_MAT3 or FLOAT_MAT2), MODELVIEWINVERSETRANSPOSE (FLOAT_MAT3 or FLOAT_MAT2), VIEWPORT (FLOAT_MAT4), POSITION, NORMAL, TEXCOORD_0, JOINT, JOINT_MATRIX, and WEIGHT.

source.description: Specifies the node id (property name) of the node whose transform is used as the parameter's value.

value.description: Depending on type, this is a scalar or an array, and a number or boolean.  Material overrides this value.
